data.title: Is Microsoft Stock A Buy Right Now? Here's What IBD Charts Show
data.text: Software giant Microsoft has earned plaudits for its successful pivot from desktop computing to cloud computing. Many investors may be wondering: Is MSFT stock a buy right now?
